member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbConnectionWrapper.Close
member.summary: Closes the connection to the database. This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.
member.exception: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.

member.summary: Wraps the connection.

member.name: P:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbConnectionWrapper.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets the time to wait while establishing a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
member.returns: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open. The default value is determined by the specific type of connection that you are using.

member.name: P:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbConnectionWrapper.Database
member.summary: Gets the name of the current database after a connection is opened, or the database name specified in the connection string before the connection is opened.
member.returns: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbConnectionWrapper.DataSource
member.summary: Gets the name of the database server to which to connect.

member.summary: Gets or sets the wrapped connection.

member.name: P:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbConnectionWrapper.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the string used to open the connection.
member.returns: The connection string used to establish the initial connection. The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbConnectionWrapper.ServerVersion
member.summary: Gets a string that represents the version of the server to which the object is connected.
member.returns: The version of the database. The format of the string returned depends on the specific type of connection you are using.

member.summary: Creates the command definition wrapper.
member.param: The wrapped command definition.
The command tree.
member.returns: object.

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.CreateProviderManifest(System.String,System.Data.Common.DbProviderManifest)
member.summary: Creates the provider manifest wrapper.
member.param: Provider invariant name.
The provider manifest to be wrapped.
member.returns: wrapper for given provider invariant name wrapping given provider manifest.

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.GetDbProviderManifestToken(System.Data.Common.DbConnection)
member.summary: Gets the provider manifest token.
member.param: The database connection.
member.returns: Provider Manfiest Token suitable for inclusion in SSDL file and connection string
member.remarks: The provider manifest token is created by concatenating wrapped provider invariant name and its token separated by semicolon, for example when wrapping SqlClient for SQL Server 2005 the provider manifest token will be "System.Data.SqlClient;2005"

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.GetDbProviderManifest(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the provider manifest for given provider manifest token.
member.param: The provider manifest token.
member.returns: for a given token.

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.CreateDbCommandDefinition(System.Data.Common.DbProviderManifest,System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbCommandTree)
member.summary: Creates the command definition wrapper for a given provider manifest and command tree.
member.param: The provider manifest.
The command tree.
member.returns: object.

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.DbCreateDatabase(System.Data.Common.DbConnection,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection)
member.summary: Creates a database indicated by connection and creates schema objects (tables, primary keys, foreign keys) based on the contents of a .
member.param: Connection to a non-existent database that needs to be created and populated with the store objects indicated with the storeItemCollection parameter.
Execution timeout for any commands needed to create the database.
The collection of all store items based on which the script should be created.

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.DbDatabaseExists(System.Data.Common.DbConnection,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether a given database exists on the server and whether schema objects contained in the storeItemCollection have been created.
member.param: Connection to a database whose existence is verified by this method.
Execution timeout for any commands needed to determine the existence of the database.
The structure of the database whose existence is determined by this method.
member.returns: true if the database indicated by the connection and the parameter exists.

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.DbDeleteDatabase(System.Data.Common.DbConnection,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection)
member.summary: Deletes all store objects specified in the store item collection from the database and the database itself.
member.param: Connection to an existing database that needs to be deleted.
Execution timeout for any commands needed to delete the database.
The structure of the database to be deleted.

member.name: M:EFProviderWrapperToolkit.DbProviderServicesBase.DbCreateDatabaseScript(System.String,System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection)
member.summary: Generates a data definition langauge (DDL0 script that creates schema objects (tables, primary keys, foreign keys) based on the contents of the parameter and targeted for the version of the database corresponding to the provider manifest token.
member.param: The provider manifest token identifying the target version.
The structure of the database.
member.returns: A DDL script that creates schema objects based on the contents of the parameter and targeted for the version of the database corresponding to the provider manifest token.
